str2: According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To pick out for myself, choose, elect, select. Middle voice from ek and lego; to select.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A primary preposition; 'fore', i.e. In front of, prior to.
From kataballo; a deposition, i.e. Founding; figuratively, conception.
Probably from the base of komizo; orderly arrangement, i.e. Decoration; by implication, the world (morally).
I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
Blameless, without blemish, unblemished, faultless. Unblemished.
Before the face of, over against. From kata and enopion; directly in front of.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From agapao; love, i.e. Affection or benevolence; specially a love-feast.
